job_history.role_name: SENIOR VICE-PRESIDENT AND CHIEF INFORMATION OFFICER
job_history.work_description: Industry expert in a wide variety of technology systems, business applications and IT service management. Primary focus: Network Security and IT Operational Management using the fundamentals of scalar design/architecture and business process improvement.

Designed a system to overhaul the entire information gathering and distribution process through the use of portal technology. Streamlined operations and in doing so foster an atmosphere of empowerment and accountability using the principles of Enterprise Resource Planning.
Challenged to secure and improve reliability of wide area network and all future business expansions sites.
Network Administration Install, configure and maintain organization's network.

education.university: State University of New York at Stony Brook

skills.name: Network Security
skills.explanation: Industry expert with extensive experience in network security, including securing wide area networks and implementing IT operational management.

skills.name: IT Operational Management
skills.explanation: Primary focus on IT operational management, including the use of scalar design and architecture, and business process improvement.

skills.name: Enterprise Resource Planning
skills.explanation: Streamlined operations using the principles of Enterprise Resource Planning, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Portal Technology
skills.explanation: Designed a system to overhaul the entire information gathering and distribution process using portal technology, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Business Process Improvement
skills.explanation: Implemented business process improvement using the fundamentals of scalar design and architecture, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Held senior leadership positions, including Senior Vice-President and Chief Information Officer, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Network Administration
skills.explanation: Installed, configured, and maintained organization's network, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Wide Area Network (WAN) Management
skills.explanation: Challenged to secure and improve reliability of wide area network, indicating strong proficiency.
